text:
"This Summit has become a valued platform for African voices and for a frank engagement on the many challenges and opportunities on the continent."

Keynote Address by President @CyrilRamaphosa at the Financial Times #FTAfrica Summit 2019, London, UK. http://bit.ly/2IOBhw2
text_html: "This Summit has become a valued platform for African voices and for a frank engagement on the many challenges and opportunities on the continent." Keynote Address by President @CyrilRamaphosa at the Financial Times #FTAfrica Summit 2019, London, UK. http://bit.ly/2IOBhw2

text:
“We may come from different parts of the world, we may speak different languages and have different cultures. But our fortunes are intertwined. Our destinies intersect.
 
And ultimately, our success story will be a shared one.”

President @CyrilRamaphosa
#FTAfrica Summitpic.twitter.com/QHxlRsJZp8
text_html: “We may come from different parts of the world, we may speak different languages and have different cultures. But our fortunes are intertwined. Our destinies intersect.   And ultimately, our success story will be a shared one.” President @CyrilRamaphosa #FTAfrica Summitpic.twitter.com/QHxlRsJZp8

text:
“Africa wants to deal with the rest of the world on its own terms. It wants to see an end to outside interference, particularly from those countries that continue to fuel conflict in African countries.”

President @CyrilRamaphosa
#FTAfrica Summit
London, UK  
14 October 2019pic.twitter.com/gMsr8Blatp
text_html: “Africa wants to deal with the rest of the world on its own terms. It wants to see an end to outside interference, particularly from those countries that continue to fuel conflict in African countries.” President @CyrilRamaphosa #FTAfrica Summit London, UK 14 October 2019pic.twitter.com/gMsr8Blatp

text:
“One of the greatest challenges to our economy is Eskom, which has huge debt, liquidity problems & operational challenges. We have embarked on a process to strengthen governance, cut costs, improve revenue collection and increase energy availability“

President @CyrilRamaphosapic.twitter.com/EOQS7L20jr
text_html: “One of the greatest challenges to our economy is Eskom, which has huge debt, liquidity problems & operational challenges. We have embarked on a process to strengthen governance, cut costs, improve revenue collection and increase energy availability“ President @CyrilRamaphosapic.twitter.com/EOQS7L20jr

text:
“Like many other countries on the continent, South Africa is positioning itself as an investment destination of choice. At the core of these efforts are good governance, growth enhancing reforms and macro-economic stability.”

President @CyrilRamaphosa
#FTAfrica London, UKpic.twitter.com/ggxGNOwvf0
text_html: “Like many other countries on the continent, South Africa is positioning itself as an investment destination of choice. At the core of these efforts are good governance, growth enhancing reforms and macro-economic stability.” President @CyrilRamaphosa #FTAfrica London, UKpic.twitter.com/ggxGNOwvf0

text: President #Ramaphosa: We share a common vision to see greater levels of investment directed into Africa and to see higher volumes of intra-African trade. Trade among countries in Africa is currently at 15%, compared to 47% in the Americas, 61% in Asia and 67% in Europe. #FTAfricapic.twitter.com/xGUrgCzRSA
text_html: President #Ramaphosa: We share a common vision to see greater levels of investment directed into Africa and to see higher volumes of intra-African trade. Trade among countries in Africa is currently at 15%, compared to 47% in the Americas, 61% in Asia and 67% in Europe. #FTAfricapic.twitter.com/xGUrgCzRSA

text:
“The message we bring here today is that Africa is ready for the great leap frog on many fronts including in attracting investment, displaying its innovative talent & capability and catapulting itself to greater heights of human development.”

President @CyrilRamaphosa
#FTAfricapic.twitter.com/DzqRTMgnu0

text: Ramaphosa: We have spoken extensively about the scourge of gender based violence. text: As a state, we commit to doing all we can to uphold the right of all, particularly womxn and children to their lives, to their wellbeing, to their safety and to their human dignity;
text_html: As a state, we commit to doing all we can to uphold the right of all, particularly womxn and children to their lives, to their wellbeing, to their safety and to their human dignity;

text: And to MEN we say you have an important role to play in speaking out against gender-based violence, actively playing a role in transforming your own and other men’s attitudes towards  women based on their sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and sexual identity.
text_html: And to MEN we say you have an important role to play in speaking out against gender-based violence, actively playing a role in transforming your own and other men’s attitudes towards women based on their sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and sexual identity.

text: We have a history in this country of resisting violence  and of working tirelessly towards a society that upholds and respects the human rights and dignity of our people. Let us build on that history. This is a TIME to act – a time to be bold and decisive.

text: The Military Command Council is the highest decision making body in the SANDF comprised of Chiefs of the Army, Navy, Air Force, Military Health Services, Defence Intelligence & Joint Operations, as led by Chief of the SANDF Gen Shoke.
